pr_title: Enable Terraform CI/CD triggers for early-access

timeline.message: Enable Terraform CI/CD triggers for early-access

timeline.bodyText: Do we still need it to watch for terraform branch?
timeline.author: xingao267

replies.bodyText: It's just a precaution, in case we (or another team) need to use it as a staging ground before early-access.
replies.author: MartinPetkov

replies.bodyText: What if there are conflicts and different changes made to the configs in the two branches? Both are modifying the same GCP infra right now. If we are doing a staging and prod way, then we should have two set of GCP infra, one is linked to the configs in early-access and one is linked to the configs in terraform branch.
replies.author: xingao267

replies.bodyText: I see what you mean, it would be the same infra being changed by two different branches. We instead want just one source-of-truth. I'll change it.
replies.author: MartinPetkov
